attributes.action: stop the criminalisation of the taxpayer by allowing the prison authorities to fund the illegal use of Class A drugs in publicly funded prisons through the provision of 'safer' syringes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I were to fund a drug user, on the street, in the upkeep of his habit I would be subject to criminal charges.  How is it, then, possible for the government to sanction the use of taxpayer pounds to fund drug abuse in government institutions with money taken from the taxpayer.  This use of taxpayer pounds in blatant criminal activity is illegal, immoral and cannot be allowed to continue.
